Barbed_Wire.name: Barbed Wire
Barbed_Wire.stack: +20% larger radius, +17% damage/sec. Deminishing returns on damage/sec increase.

Bitter_Root.name: Bitter Root
Bitter_Root.stack: Further gain 8% max HP, up to 38 stacks (300% extra HP).

Bundle_Of_Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle_Of_Fireworks.description: Upon opening/activating an object, fire 8 fireworks that deal 300% damage.

Bustling_Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling_Fungus.description: After 2 seconds, heal for 4.5% of your health every second.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.description: On Hit: Deal +50% damage to enemies above 80% health.

Fire_Shield.name: Fire Shield
Fire_Shield.description: After being hit for 10% of your maximum health in one hit: explode, dealing 400% damage and knocking back enemies.
Fire_Shield.stack: Increases explosion damage by 200%, and increases knockback by 20%.

First_Aid_Kit.name: First Aid Kit
First_Aid_Kit.description: Heal for 10 health after 1.1 seconds of getting hit.
First_Aid_Kit.stack: Each additional First Aid Kit increases the heal by 10.

Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.description: On kill: Killing enemies burns the ground for 60% damage for 2 seconds.

Headstompers.name: Headstompers
Headstompers.description: Hurt enemies by falling for up to 507% damage.

Hermits_Scarf.name: Hermit's Scarf
Hermits_Scarf.stack: Increases dodge chance +5%, up to a maximum of 35% at 6 stacks.

Lens_Makers_Glasses.name: Lens Maker's Glasses
Lens_Makers_Glasses.description: On Hit: your attacks have a 7% chance to critically strike, dealing double damage.
Lens_Makers_Glasses.stack: +7% crit chance. 100% chance to crit on 14 stacks.

Meat_Nugget.name: Meat Nugget
Meat_Nugget.description: On Hit: 8% chance to drop 2 meat nuggets that heals for 2x6 health.

Monster_Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster_Tooth.description: On kill: Killing an enemy heals you for 10 health.

Mortar_Tube.name: Mortar Tube
Mortar_Tube.description: On Hit: 9% chance to fire a mortar for 170% damage

Mysterious_Vial.name: Mysterious Vial
Mysterious_Vial.description: Increase health regeneration by 1.2 per second.

Pauls_Goat_Hoof.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
Pauls_Goat_Hoof.stack: Further increases movement speed by 20%, caps at around 35.
Pauls_Goat_Hoof.unlock: Fail a shrine 3 times in a row.

Rusty_Blade.name: Rusty Blade
Rusty_Blade.description: On Hit: 15% chance to bleed an enemy for 4x35% damage.
Rusty_Blade.stack: 15% extra chance to bleed, 100% chance at 7 stacks.

Snake_Eyes.name: Snake Eyes
Snake_Eyes.description: Failing a shrine increases crit chance by 5%.
Snake_Eyes.stack: Further increases crit chance by 3% for each shrine fail.
Snake_Eyes.unlock: Pass a shrine 4 times in a row.

Soldiers_Syringe.name: Soldier's Syringe
Soldiers_Syringe.stack: adds another 15% increase up to 13 times, maxing at +195%

Spikestrip.name: Spikestrip
Spikestrip.description: When hit, drops spikestrips (lasts for 2 seconds) that slow enemies by 20%
Spikestrip.stack: Increases the duration of spikestrips by 1 second per stack.
Spikestrip.unlock: Enforcer: Block 2000 damage total with your shield.

Sprouting_Egg.name: Sprouting Egg
Sprouting_Egg.description: After not being hit for 7 seconds, increase health regen by 2.4 health per second.
Sprouting_Egg.stack: +2.4 heath per second out of combat.

Sticky_Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky_Bomb.description: On Hit: 8% chance to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 140% damage.

Taser.name: Taser
Taser.description: On Hit: 7% chance to snare enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Taser.unlock: Loader: Travel for 20,000 feet using the Hydraulic Gauntlet.

Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.description: On level up drop a banner. Raise attack/move speed by 30% and damage by 4.
Warbanner.stack: Area of effect increased by 40% of base size.

56_Leaf_Clover.name: 56 Leaf Clover
56_Leaf_Clover.description: Elite mobs have a 4% chance to drop items.
56_Leaf_Clover.stack: +1.5% item drop chance, up to a maximum of 100% at 65 stacks.

Arms_Race.name: Arms Race
Arms_Race.description: On drone action: 9% chance for drones to fire missiles and mortars.
Arms_Race.stack: +10% chance to fire missles, +170% more mortar damage
Arms_Race.unlock: HAN-D: Kill 10 enemies with FORCED-REASSEMBLY simultaneously.

AtG_Missile_Mk_1.name: AtG Missle Mk. 1
AtG_Missile_Mk_1.description: On Hit: 10% chance of firing a missile that deals 300% damage.

Boxing_Gloves.name: Boxing Gloves
Boxing_Gloves.description: On Hit: hitting enemies have a 15% chance to knock them back.

Chargefield_Generator.name: Chargefield Generator
Chargefield_Generator.description: On kill: generate a lightning ring, dealing 100% damage/sec for 6 seconds. Subsequent kills will expland the ring.

Concussion_Grenade.name: Concussion Grenade
Concussion_Grenade.description: On Hit: 6% chance to stun enemies for two seconds.
Concussion_Grenade.unlock: Engineer: Kill a Boss in 15 seconds or less.

Dead_Mans_Foot.name: Dead Man's Foot
Dead_Mans_Foot.description: Drop a poison mine at low health for 4x150% damage.

Energy_Cell.name: Energy Cell
Energy_Cell.description: Increased attack speed by up to 40% based on how much HP you have lost.
Energy_Cell.stack: +20% increased maximum attack speed, caps at 90% increase with 4 cells.

Filial_Imprinting.name: Filial Imprinting
Filial_Imprinting.description: Hatch a creature who drops attack speed/health regen/move speed buffs every 20 seconds.

Frost_Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost_Relic.description: On kill: Killing an enemy surrounds you with 3 icicles that deal 3x33% damage.

Golden_Gun.name: Golden Gun
Golden_Gun.description: Deals bonus damage per gold, up to 40% damage at 700 gold. Scales with time.
Golden_Gun.stack: Halves the gold required for max damage.

Guardians_Heart.name: Guardian's Heart
Guardians_Heart.description: Gain a 60 health shield. Recharges in 7 seconds.

Harvesters_Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe
Harvesters_Scythe.description: On crit: heal for 8 health. Gain 5% critical chance.
Harvesters_Scythe.stack: +5% critical chance and +2 health on a critical strike.
Harvesters_Scythe.unlock: use a health shrine that drops you below 5% health.

Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.description: On kill: killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1.

Leeching_Seed.name: Leeching Seed
Leeching_Seed.description: On Hit: Dealing damage heals you for 2 health. If the shot pierces and hits mutiple enemies, there will be diminishing returns for each subsequent enemy hit.

Panic_Mines.name: Panic Mines
Panic_Mines.description: Drop a mine at low health for 500% damage.
Panic_Mines.unlock: Miner: Survive the teleporter event without falling below 50% health.

Predatory_Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory_Instincts.description: On crit: increase attack speed by 10%. Stacks up to 30%.
Predatory_Instincts.stack: +5% crit chance. Further increase 1% attack speed increment on crit strikes.
Predatory_Instincts.unlock: Huntress: Defeat the Legendary Wisp without taking damage.

Prison_Shackles.name: Prison Shackles
Prison_Shackles.description: On Hit: Slow enemies by 20% on every attack.

Red_Whip.name: Red Whip
Red_Whip.description: Leaving combat for 1.5 seconds boosts your movement speed by 80%.

Rusty_Jetpack.name: Rusty Jetpack
Rusty_Jetpack.description: Decrease gravity by 50% and increase jump height by 10%.

Time_Keepers_Secret.name: Time Keeper's Secret
Time_Keepers_Secret.description: Falling to low health stops time for 3 seconds.
Time_Keepers_Secret.stack: +1s time stop duration, up to a maximum of 10 seconds at 8 stacks.

Toxic_Worm.name: Toxic Worm
Toxic_Worm.description: Infect enemies, dealing 50% damage/sec. Bounces to other enemies on death.

Ukulele.name: Ukulele
Ukulele.description: On Hit: 20% chance to fire chain lighting for 4x33% damage.

Will-O-The-Wisp.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
Will-O-The-Wisp.description: On kill: 33% chance to create a lava pillar from the enemy's corpse for 250% damage.
Will-O-The-Wisp.stack: Further increases lava pillar damage by +100%.

Alien_Head.name: Alien Head
Alien_Head.stack: Stacks multiplicatively up to 3 times. (60% reduction).
Alien_Head.unlock: Obtain 7 Monster Teeth and 1 Guardian's Heart.

Ancient_Scepter.name: Ancient Scepter
Ancient_Scepter.description: Upgrade your fourth ability; this is unique to each character class. Full list of effects here.
Ancient_Scepter.unlock: Mercenary: Beat the game on Monsoon difficulty.

AtG_Missile_Mk_2.name: AtG Missle Mk. 2
AtG_Missile_Mk_2.description: On Hit: 7% chance to fire three missiles that deal 3x300% damage.
AtG_Missile_Mk_2.stack: +7% chance to fire missiles. 100% at 15 stacks.

Beating_Embryo.name: Beating Embryo
Beating_Embryo.description: use items have a 30% chance to deal double the effect.

Brilliant_Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth
Brilliant_Behemoth.description: On Hit: your projectiles explode for a bonus 20% damage to nearby enemies.

Ceremonial_Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial_Dagger.description: On kill: fire out 4 heat-seeking bolts that deal 100% damage.

Dios_Friend.name: Dio's friend
Dios_Friend.description: Taking fatal damage revives you to 40% health. Invincible for 2 seconds.
Dios_Friend.stack: Can not be stacked for multiple revives, but if the revive effect has been used picking up another will reset it.

Firemans_Boots.name: Fireman's Boots
Firemans_Boots.description: Walking leaves behind a fire trail that burns for 35% damage.
Firemans_Boots.unlock: Survive in lava for 1 minute straight.

Happiest_Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest_Mask.description: On kill: spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 70% health and 50% damage for 15 seconds.

Heaven_Cracker.name: Heaven Cracker
Heaven_Cracker.description: Every 4 basic attacks pierce through enemies for 100% damage.
Heaven_Cracker.stack: Reduce attacks required by 1 per additional Heaven Cracker. Pierces every attack at 4 stacks.

Hyper-Threader.name: Hyper-Threader
Hyper-Threader.description: On Hit: Every attack fires a laser, dealing 40% damage and bouncing to 2 enemies.
Hyper-Threader.unlock: Commando: Activate the third teleporter without being hit once.

Interstellar_Desk_Plant.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Interstellar_Desk_Plant.description: On kill: spawn an alien plant that heals you for 8 HP.

Laser_Turbine.name: Laser Turbine
Laser_Turbine.description: All your attacks charge the generator. At full power, fire a laser for 2000% damage.
Laser_Turbine.stack: Increases charge amount per ability use.
Laser_Turbine.unlock: CHEF: Have 20 cleavers in the air simultaneously.

Old_Box.name: Old Box
Old_Box.description: Drop a jack-in-the-box at low health, fearing enemies for 2 seconds.

Permafrost.name: Permafrost
Permafrost.description: On Hit: Chance to stun enemies for 1.5 seconds and slow enemies by 60% for three seconds.

Photon_Jetpack.name: Photon Jetpack
Photon_Jetpack.description: Allows the player to fly for up to 1.6 seconds nonstop; the jetpack's fuel tank quickly refills when not in use.
Photon_Jetpack.unlock: End a teleporter timer with 0 enemies on the map.

Plasma_Chain.name: Plasma Chain
Plasma_Chain.description: On Hit: Chance to tether onto enemies dealing 60% damage per second.

Rapid_Mitosis.name: Rapid Mitosis
Rapid_Mitosis.description: Reduce the cooldown of use items by 25%.
Rapid_Mitosis.stack: Further reduces item cooldowns by 25%, multiplicatively. Soft caps at around 30 stacks.

Repulsion_Armor.name: Repulsion Armor
Repulsion_Armor.description: After 6 hits reduce and reflect incoming damage by 83% for 3 seconds.
Repulsion_Armor.stack: Increases length of reflection by 1 second to a cap of 8 seconds.

Shattering_Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering_Justice.description: Attacks reduce enemy armor by 5. Reduction stacks up to 25.
Shattering_Justice.unlock: Miner: Reach level 10 without getting hurt more than once.

Telescopic_Sight.name: Telescopic Sight
Telescopic_Sight.description: On Hit: 1% chance to instantly kill an enemy.
Telescopic_Sight.stack: +0.5% proc chance up to a maximum of 3%.

Thallium.name: Thallium
Thallium.description: On Hit: damage/slow by 500 enemy damage% and 100% speed over 3 seconds.

The_Hit_List.name: The Hit List
The_Hit_List.description: On kill: killing a marked enemy permanently increases damage by 0.5, up to a maximum of 20.
The_Hit_List.unlock: Bandit: Reset your cooldown 15 times consecutively.

The_Ol_Lopper.name: The Ol' Lopper
The_Ol_Lopper.description: 100% critical chance on enemies below 9% health.
The_Ol_Lopper.stack: +4% health threshold, up to a cap of 35% health at 8 stacks

Wicked_Ring.name: Wicked Ring
Wicked_Ring.description: On crit: reduce cooldowns by 1 second.
Wicked_Ring.stack: +1s cooldown reduction on crit, +6% critical chance.

Burning_Witness.name: Burning Witness
Burning_Witness.description: On kill: Grants a firetrail, 5% movement speed, and 1 damage for 6 seconds.

Colossal_Knurl.name: Colossal Knurl
Colossal_Knurl.description: Increase health by 40, health regeneration by 1.2/second, and armor by 6.

Ifrits_Horn.name: Ifrit's Horn
Ifrits_Horn.description: On Hit: 8% chance to incinerate enemies for 220% damage.

Imp_Overlords_Tentacle.name: Imp Overlord's Tentacle
Imp_Overlords_Tentacle.description: Summon an Imp bodyguard that revives every 60 seconds.
Imp_Overlords_Tentacle.stack: Increase his health, damage, and speed, and change his color.

Legendary_Spark.name: Legendary Spark
Legendary_Spark.description: On Hit: 8% chance to smite enemies for 200% damage.

Nematocyst_Nozzle.name: Nematocyst Nozzle
Nematocyst_Nozzle.description: Shoot out 6 nematocysts that deal 200% damage.

Captains_Brooch.name: Captain's Brooch
Captains_Brooch.unlock: Unlock a Golden Chest with the Skeleton Key.

Carrara_Marble.name: Carrara Marble
Carrara_Marble.description: Place a marble gate. Teleport back to the gate by activating again.

Crudely_Drawn_Buddy.name: Crudely Drawn Buddy
Crudely_Drawn_Buddy.description: Blow up a decoy, attracting enemies for 8 seconds. Looks just like you.
Crudely_Drawn_Buddy.embryo: Doubles duration of decoy to 16 seconds.

Disposable_Missile_Launcher.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
Disposable_Missile_Launcher.embryo: Doubles the amount of missiles to 24.

Drone_Repair_Kit.name: Drone Repair Kit
Drone_Repair_Kit.description: Repairs all drones to full health.

Dynamite_Plunger.name: Dynamite Plunger
Dynamite_Plunger.description: Hitting an enemy drops dynamite. Use to detonate for 400% damage.

Foreign_Fruit.name: Foreign Fruit
Foreign_Fruit.description: Heal yourself for 50% of your health.

Gigantic_Amethyst.name: Gigantic Amethyst
Gigantic_Amethyst.unlock: Loader: Kill the Overloading Magma Worm.

Glowing_Meteorite.name: Glowing Meteorite
Glowing_Meteorite.description: Meteors fall from the sky, damaging enemies and friends for 220% damage. Lasts 8 seconds.

Gold-plated_Bomb.name: Gold-plated Bomb
Gold-plated_Bomb.description: use 50% of your gold to create a bomb, dealing 1 damage per gold spent.

Minefield.name: Minefield
Minefield.description: Drop 7 mines at your feet, each dealing 400% damage.
Minefield.embryo: Drop 6 additional mines, for a total of 13.

Jar_Of_Souls.name: Jar of Souls
Jar_Of_Souls.description: Duplicate every enemy as a ghost to fight on your side.
Jar_Of_Souls.embryo: Summons an additional ghost per enemy.

Lost_Doll.name: Lost Doll
Lost_Doll.description: Sacrifice 25% health to damage an enemy for 500% of your maximum health.
Lost_Doll.unlock: Survive a boss with less than 20% health.

Massive_Leech.name: Massive Leech
Massive_Leech.description: For 10 seconds, every hit heals you for 10 health.

Pillaged_Gold.name: Pillaged Gold
Pillaged_Gold.description: For 14 seconds, every monster will drop 1 gold on hit.
Pillaged_Gold.unlock: Bandit: Kill a boss with "Lights Out"

Prescriptions.name: Prescriptions
Prescriptions.description: Increase damage by 10 and attack speed by %40 for 8 seconds.
Prescriptions.embryo: Doubles the attack speed increment to +80%
Prescriptions.unlock: Enforcer: Stay in "Shield Mode" for 5 minutes straight (in combat).

Rotten_Brain.name: Rotten Brain
Rotten_Brain.description: Throw a brain that bounces in place, damaging/slowing enemies for 6x200%.

Safeguard_Lantern.name: Safeguard Lantern
Safeguard_Lantern.description: Drop a lantern for 10 seconds. Fears and damages enemies for 20% damage.

Sawmerang.name: Sawmerang
Sawmerang.description: Throw out a sawmerang for 500% damage and bleed for 4*100%.
Sawmerang.embryo: Launches an identical Sawmerang behind the player.

Shattered_Mirror.name: Shattered Mirror
Shattered_Mirror.description: For 15 seconds, double all of your abilities' damage and effects.
Shattered_Mirror.embryo: Damage and effects are tripled instead.

Shield_Generator.name: Shield Generator
Shield_Generator.unlock: HAN-D: Stay above 70% health for 25 minutes.

Explorers_Key.name: Explorer's Key
Explorers_Key.description: Open all the chests in view.

Snowglobe.name: Snowglobe
Snowglobe.description: Summon a snowstorm that freezes monsters at a 30% chance over 7 seconds.
Snowglobe.embryo: Doubles the duration of the snowstorm.

The_Back-up.name: The Back-up
The_Back-up.description: Create 4 drones to fight for you for 10 seconds.

Thqwib.name: Thqwib
Thqwib.description: Release a bloom of 30 thqwibs, detonating on impact for 200%.

Unstable_Watch.name: Unstable Watch
Unstable_Watch.unlock: Complete the first stage in under 5 minutes.

Kin.name: Kin
Kin.description: Only one enemy type will spawn per stage.

Distortion.name: Distortion
Distortion.description: Locks a random skill every minute, but gives you 25% cooldown reduction.

Spite.name: Spite
Spite.description: Enemies release small bouncing explosives. These explosives only hurt the player.

Glass.name: Glass
Glass.description: You start with 500% more damage, but have 10% of your normal HP. Upon leveling up, recieve 300% and 25% of the damage and health increase, respectively.

Enigma.name: Enigma
Enigma.description: Enigma will replace your active item. Using enigma will trigger a random use item effect. When Enigma is active, Small Enigmas will drop instead of use items.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
Sacrifice.description: Enemies have a chance to drop items, but chests no longer spawn. Does not share the same drop roll as 56 Leaf Clover.

Command.name: Command
Command.description: Items are replaced with boxes that allow the player to choose the dropped item.

Spirit.name: Spirit
Spirit.description: Run faster when at lower HP. Applies to monsters as well as the player.
Spirit.unlock: Found in the Temple of the Elders.

Origin.name: Origin
Origin.description: Every 10 minutes, a portal materializes and summons 3 Purple imps, and 1 Imp Vanguard.
Origin.unlock: Defeat Providence with all other artifacts activated.

Keycard.name: Keycard
Keycard.description: Opens locked doors on the UES Contact Light (Final Level).
Keycard.stack: Each key unlocks one door. (Maximum of four keys)
Keycard.drop: Dropped by enemies or found in golden containers on the UES Contact Light (Final Level).

Small_Enigma.name: Small Enigma
Small_Enigma.description: Reduces the cooldown of use items by 5%.
Small_Enigma.unlock: Can be obtained when the Enigma artifact is enabled.

White_Undershirt_(M).name: White Undershirt (M)
White_Undershirt_(M).drop: Dropped by the Armored Boar on the level Boar Beach.

special items.textFlair:
ARTIFACT.
This item must be toggled on the character select screen.
